attributes.action: Stop foreign aid and use the funds to sort our own country out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop using taxpayers money on a crusade around the world. There are problems in Britain that need addressing. Unemployment, the homeless, deprived areas, education and most of all the Nhs. If the public want to donate their own money then fine, but we should have a choice where our money and taxes are used.
